work.company_info: North builds the world's first consumer focused smart glasses that offers an intuitive experience.
work.description: Responsible for back-end cloud services that powers the core user features on smart glasses. Provided critical framework that supported rapid development of new features during Product Market Fit.
work.brief: Built a cloud-based feature management platform for smart glasses & implemented OAuth authentication services
work.impact: Product owner of a feature management platform for smart glasses, saving over thousands of dollars per year. Shipped and deployed new cloud authentication scheme using OAuth2.0 standards; increase productivity by creating internal infrastructure and tools

work.company_info: Intact insurance is one of the biggest insurance company in Canada, providing Canadians and business with auto and home insurances
work.brief: Building data modeling pipeline & distributed infrastructure for data science
work.description: Responsible for providing the data lab (Intact's core machine learning research lab) with a reliable, scalable and distributed software infrastructure and libraries using parallelization and Docker Swarm
work.impact: Designed and built a new distributed infrastructure for data science, enabling data scientists to run, train and analyze their models ~5 times faster with a more efficient resource sharing

work.company_info: Nuance provides speech recognition, and artificial intelligence. Current business products focus on server and embedded speech recognition, telephone call steering systems, automated telephone directory
work.brief: Human vs. Bugs battle royale; bug detection for natural language processing engines
work.impact: Created test cases with over 95% test coverage on lines of code, branches and functions. Built a custom load testing framework and tool that reduced overheads from JMeter.

projects.description: A property management application helping landlords and tenants
